catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 820
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: circular bronze mirror with two possibly Portuguese figures in low relief; one figure is taller, carrying two circular objects in PL hand, and object on pole over PR shoulder; second figure is shorter, carrying a plate and tray in each hand; comes with wooden display plaque
signed: LL: Number one under the Heaven, Sado
title: Mirror with Nanban figures
